A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
"No one hates Star Wars more than Star Wars fans."


This quotes rings true\, with the amount of hate coming from the fan base. This film brings Star Wars closer to its original trilogy roots\, but then adds a enough twists to make it unique. It adds new layers to new and old characters alike. While brining back the humor that the original trilogy had in spades\, while still passing the torch to a new generation. 

I recommend seeing it with an open mind\, and give it at chance before letting the hate flow through you.
